attributes.action: Pay NHS staff the market price for fuel used when visiting clients in the community
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to do community visit a car is used as part of a leasing scheme. staff pay for the fuel which is reimbursed at a rate of 11.7 pence per mile travelled. The cost per mile to the staff member is over 16 pence per mile travelled.  This results in the staff member subsidising the cost of the travel.
